title: 8-2 In Provisionals And I Get Bronze 5?!?!
body:
Okay so in season 5 i was in bronze 5 and for a good reason. I wont deny that I used to flame and blame everyone else for my mistakes. During the pre season i worked on my emotional state and i became a better player. Realising my own mistake etc.

So thinking i was good enough i went into the placements really early. I was doing well with 7 ranked wins in a row. And then i lost 2 but won the last one. But after all the effort and the good scores, i got back to b5.....really.....riot....wtf

Can someone please explain, i need an explanation to what happened. Was it my MMR? Was it because i was in b5 in s5????? 
If anyone could help me out that would be great. Thank you.

replies.body: Well it depends on your MMR, and if you were at b5 but losing alot of games, then ur MMR wouldve been really low, so getting that placement would be normal, but if you were high MMR for a bronze 5, which is rare, because it is the lowest tier possible, then u shouldve been a bit higher say b4-2. However, now that you have won 8-2 you should be winning a great amount of LP per game (highest is 40 per game), unless ur mmr was really bad last season.
Ah right. My MMR was 1100 so would that still be low bronze? I can still get out of b5 its just gonna take a while xD
I was bronze 2 before the new season, I won 7 out of 10 and got bronze 4..

As others have said, it was very likely due to your MMR. If you have seriously worked on your attitude and skill (which I think is awesome btw) then you should have no problem climbing! It's pretty rare to get placed at a higher rank than you were in the previous season, even winning 10/10 games. So just accept it, it sucks, but you're gonna  climb to Plat and beyond now, it'll just take an **extra** couple days ;) ! 
^_^
Thank you! Climbing shouldn't be a problem. Since ive posted this I have nearly made it out of b5 already :)
i was gold 5 i did my placements 5/5 and they put me on b2 how can this be lose 500 elo like this just how!! and fresh lvl 30 come rank loose 10 games and get into silver wath is this system..

Ended S1 end of season, was thrown into B2 with a bunch of filthy nonskilled trolling bastards. 
Only won like 8-9 games in provisional though
